QuestData.Title: Tiny Treats
QuestData.Description: As you near, your serpent opens its mouth and begins drooling. It looks quite hungry since you last left it.$B$BFrom the way it whimpers and slaps its tail, you can tell it is not looking for just any treat, but a special favorite snack.$B$BYour serpent loves to munch on tiny spider eyes, but this delicacy comes only from the Widowspawn spiders in the cave along the coast to the north.$B$BWell, what's a rider to do? Your serpent is waiting.
